sentences.en: a lax attitude to health and safety regulations
sentences.cn: 对卫生与安全条例的马虎态度

sentences.en: He is lax in his morals.
I was lax in my duties.
sentences.cn: 我对本职工作马虎松懈。

sentences.en: In his earlier writings he was indeed lax on this matter.
sentences.cn: 在他早期著作中,对这方面他的确是不清楚的.

sentences.en: Lane's views on marriage seem somewhat lax.
sentences.cn: 勒天看待婚姻的态度好象不大正派.

sentences.en: Lax security allowed the thieves to enter.
sentences.cn: 松懈的保安措施使小偷有机可乘.

sentences.en: Miss Early's always saying we're too lax in the terms we quote our buyers.
sentences.cn: 厄尔利小姐说我们报给买方的条件太宽了.

sentences.en: MPs attacked lax management and errors of judgment.
sentences.cn: 议员们抨击管理的松散和判断的失误。

sentences.en: One of the problem areas is lax security for airport personnel.
sentences.cn: 问题之一是对机场员工的安检措施马虎松懈。

sentences.en: The capsules of the synovial joints are lax.
sentences.cn: 滑液关节的关节囊都是松弛的.

sentences.en: The modified HLLEW ( Harten - Lax - van Leer - Einfeldt - Wada ) scheme is used for the solution of fluid equations.
sentences.cn: 其中流体计算的空间离散采用改进的HLLEW ( Harten—Lax -van Leer-Einfeldt-Wada ) 格式.

sentences.en: There have been allegations from survivors that safety standards had been lax.
sentences.cn: 生还者一直指责安全标准执行不严。

sentences.en: They are lax about their appearance.
They seemed to him so lax, so nearly worldly.
sentences.cn: 他们在他的眼里是那样随随便便, 那样近于世俗.

trans.tran_cn: <医>（肠）宽松的，松弛的，松懈的，不严格的
trans.tran_en: not strict or careful enough about standards of behaviour, work, safety etc
